20110106140939.000|20110106140941.500|TR0|Thursday is Christmas Eve for
20110106140941.500|20110106140944.000|TR0|the Russian Orthodox Church,
20110106140944.000|20110106140946.500|TR0|that celebrates the birth of
20110106140946.500|20110106140949.000|TR0|Christ on January 7th.
20110106140949.000|20110106140951.500|TR0|
20110106140951.500|20110106140954.000|TR0|[[vo]]
20110106140954.000|20110106140956.500|TR0|
20110106140956.500|20110106140959.000|TR0|The difference is because
20110106140959.000|20110106141001.500|TR0|Russians mark religous feasts
20110106141001.500|20110106141004.000|TR0|using the Julian Calendar,
20110106141004.000|20110106141007.333|TR0|whereas most Western countries
20110106141007.333|20110106141010.667|TR0|use the Gregorian Calendar.
20110106141010.667|20110106141014.000|TR0|
20110106141014.000|20110106141016.500|TR0|On Thursday night, vigils will
20110106141016.500|20110106141019.000|TR0|be held in thousands of Russian

20110106141851.500|20110106141854.000|TR0|STANDUP People do not live here
20110106141854.000|20110106141856.500|TR0|anymore. The same cannot be said

20110106141914.000|20110106141916.500|TR0|After the 1986 fallout in
20110106141916.500|20110106141919.000|TR0|Chernobyl the environment
20110106141919.000|20110106141921.500|TR0|suffered badly. One strip of
20110106141921.500|20110106141924.000|TR0|forest was burnt by radiation
20110106141924.000|20110106141926.500|TR0|and turned red.
20110106141926.500|20110106141929.000|TR0|
20110106141929.000|20110106141931.500|TR0|People left the area, but mother
20110106141931.500|20110106141934.000|TR0|nature stepped in. Now Chernobyl
20110106141934.000|20110106141936.500|TR0|is home to many species of wild
20110106141936.500|20110106141939.000|TR0|animals and rare plants.
20110106141939.000|20110106141941.500|TR0|Scientists from Slovakia
20110106141941.500|20110106141944.000|TR0|studying moss in the area made

20110106141946.500|20110106141949.000|TR0|of the plant life is immune to

20110106141954.000|20110106141956.500|TR0|SOT - Martin Hajduk, scientist

20110106141959.000|20110106142001.500|TR0|We still dont know for sure how
20110106142001.500|20110106142004.000|TR0|plants are able to grow and
20110106142004.000|20110106142006.500|TR0|reproduce in the radioactive
20110106142006.500|20110106142009.000|TR0|Chernobyl area. In the beginning
20110106142009.000|20110106142011.500|TR0|of time, when Earth started to
20110106142011.500|20110106142014.000|TR0|develop, there was much more
20110106142014.000|20110106142016.500|TR0|radioactivity. So plants were

20110106142019.000|20110106142021.500|TR0|radioactivity. So this mechanism
20110106142021.500|20110106142024.000|TR0|somehow stayed inside the plants.
20110106142024.000|20110106142026.500|TR0|
20110106142026.500|20110106142029.000|TR0|Millions of hectares of land
20110106142029.000|20110106142031.500|TR0|were left contaminated. Quarter
20110106142031.500|20110106142034.000|TR0|of a century on, Kiev has
20110106142034.000|20110106142037.333|TR0|decided that this soil no longer
20110106142037.333|20110106142040.667|TR0|poses any threat to humans. In

20110106142044.000|20110106142046.500|TR0|will launch a plan to get things

20110106142239.000|20110106142241.500|TR0|
20110106142241.500|20110106142244.000|TR0|Ukraine has a law regulating any
20110106142244.000|20110106142246.500|TR0|activities in the exclusion
20110106142246.500|20110106142249.000|TR0|zone. It says no agricultural
20110106142249.000|20110106142251.500|TR0|product can be grown on this
20110106142251.500|20110106142254.000|TR0|land. And for now experts see no
20110106142254.000|20110106142256.500|TR0|possibility of this law to be

20110106142319.000|20110106142321.500|TR0|dangerous despite some
20110106142321.500|20110106142324.000|TR0|optimists. But the fact is -
